label: lem-sasaki-aggregator-lipschitz
name: Lipschitz data for the Sasaki empirical aggregators

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-mean-value
attributes_added.expression: The empirical mean satisfies value Lipschitz continuity: $L_{\mu,M}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(k) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{k}}$

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-second-moment-value
attributes_added.expression: The empirical second moment satisfies value Lipschitz continuity: $L_{m_2,M}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(k) = \frac{2V_{\max}}{\sqrt{k}}$

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-mean-structural
attributes_added.expression: The empirical mean satisfies structural Lipschitz continuity: $L_{\mu,S}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(k_{\min}) = \frac{3V_{\max}}{k_{\min}}$

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-second-moment-structural
attributes_added.expression: The empirical second moment satisfies structural Lipschitz continuity: $L_{m_2,S}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(k_{\min}) = \frac{3V_{\max}^2}{k_{\min}}$

attributes_added.label: attr-lipschitz-growth-exponents
attributes_added.expression: The growth exponents satisfy: $p_{\mu,S} = p_{m_2,S} = p_{\mathrm{worst\text{-}case}} = -1$

attributes_added.label: attr-aggregator-variance-constants
attributes_added.expression: Consequently $\kappa_{\mathrm{var}}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}} = \kappa_{\mathrm{range}}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}} = 1$ as in the canonical framework

relations_established.label: rel-aggregator-lipschitz-dispersion-equivalence
relations_established.expression: The status change count $n_c$ is bounded by the Sasaki dispersion metric: $n_c \le (N/\sqrt{\lambda_{\mathrm{status}}}) d_{\mathrm{Disp},\mathcal{Y}}^{\mathrm{Sasaki}}(\mathcal{S}_1, \mathcal{S}_2)$

properties.label: dispersion-bound-constant
properties.description: Multiplicative constant relating status changes to Sasaki dispersion distance
